description:
Detects usage of the built-in PowerShell cmdlet "Enable-WindowsOptionalFeature" used as a Deployment Image Servicing and Management tool.
Similar to DISM.exe, this cmdlet is used to enumerate, install, uninstall, configure, and update features and packages in Windows images
author: Nasreddine Bencherchali
name: Potential Suspicious Windows Feature Enabled - ProcCreation
query: (process.command_line.text:*Enable\-WindowsOptionalFeature* AND process.command_line.text:*\-Online* AND process.command_line.text:*\-FeatureName* AND process.command_line.text:(*TelnetServer* OR *Internet\-Explorer\-Optional\-amd64* OR *TFTP* OR *SMB1Protocol* OR *Client\-ProjFS* OR *Microsoft\-Windows\-Subsystem\-Linux*))
